alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Iberia, eastern Lafayette, northwestern St. Martin and southeastern St. Landry Parishes through 845 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Breaux Bridge, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Breaux Bridge, Carencro, St. Martinville, Arnaudville, Broussard, Youngsville, Henderson, Loreauville, Cade, Cecilia and Parks. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 103 and 118. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin
